data.text: Yesu nkaahokolhia Uyorodani nachanre Iphumu ya Nlhuku, nkaaholhelhiya ni Iphumu mpaka uthakoni,
waalhikachiye awe ni Nakare wo mahuku makhumi ncheshe. Mahuku onkhaye ayo ahottuka wo uhilhia ittu, paahi etu avireke yayo mahuku ayo nkaawolhiya ithalha.
Nakare nkaamwirelha, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, ulheehereke etu wiira alha malhuku alha athathuwe nkatte.”
Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Ntu khanlhama wo ulhia nkatte vekha.’ ”
Nakare nkankusha tho mpaka vachulhu ni umwooniha imwene chonkhaye cho velhaponi va.
Nakare nkeera, “Kinouvaha ikuru wo chilha imwene chonkhaye chi ni urera waya. Chonkhaye chi chiri mmathathani mwaka, kathananaka ummaha ntu kinowooria.
Mwakikhoromelhaka ni ukithimicha, chonkhaye chi chinookhalha chawinyu.”
Yesu nkaakhulha, “iholhepiya, ‘Mwaathimicheke Athithi, Nlhuku inyu vekha aya ni uvara mitheko chaya!’ ”
Nakare nkanrweeha mpaka Uyerusalemu vachulhu ishanja yo Inupa ya Nlhuku, nkeera, “Wakhalhaka uwe phi Mwaana a Nlhuku, paahi etu uthupeke mpaka vathi.
Ukhalhawaya Malhove Matakatifu aneera, ‘Nlhuku noolhehera minepa chawe chiwe chuwopolheni.’
Ni vawo tho aneera wiira, ‘Anoukushani mmathathani mwaya nhiwe mwaarakalha mmalhukuni.’ ”
Nansho Yesu nkaakhulha, “Iholhepiya, ‘Nhinlhikache Nlhuku, Athithi inyu.’ ”
Nakare amalheke unlhikacha Yesu wo kila iphiro, nkanhiya mpaka ikatema inothananiya.
Paahi Yesu ahohokolhia Ugalilaya, ni ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku yaari vamoka ni uyo. Mwaha unomwaacha nkawaawanelha mwiilhaponi mwonkhaye.
Nkeettuchiha mu inupa chaya cho unlhapelha Nlhuku, nkaatotopelhiya ni attu onkhaye.
Paahi etu Yesu nkaarwa Unazareti, iwani yonnuwenlhe awe, ni Nihuku no Wiittuwa nkaarwa u inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku thoko chaalhemalhenlhe awe. Nkeemelha ushoma Malhove Matakatifu
nkaavahiya nrapalha naalhepiye Malhove Matakatifu ni anamilhohi ashinna Isaya wiira ashome. Nkaapatakulha ni ushoma vakittu valhepiye wiira,
“Iphumu ya Athithi uri vamoka ni mii,
ni uhimiacha wiira ikatema ihaaya
Yesu nkaavilhika ikitabu ni uhokolhosha wa namitheko aashunga, nkaakhalha vathi. Attu onkhaye wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku mmo nkayammweha wo miitho melhi paranda,
venre awe, “Alha Malhove Matakatifu alha ahotimira lhelho, thoko chinre inyu wo wiiwa kishomaka.”
Attu onkhaye nkayaachivelhiya, nkayaashangacha wiiwa malhove o nnema aahimiacha awe. Nkayaakohanacha yeeraka, “Ana ulha kahiwena mwaana a Nayusufu ulha?”
Nkeerelha wiira, “Kihochuwelha wiira nnookiirelha nlhikaaniho no wiira, ‘Namirete, wiilhamiheke umwanene.’ Ni ukiirelha tho kipangache chittu mwiiwilhe inyu kipangachaka Ukapenaumu.”
“Kinouhimeriani wo ikekhiaye tho wiira, anamilhohi khanolhohiya uwannyaya.

“Nansho nkakiiweni, wo ikekhiaye, wahokhalha anankhwelhi enchi mwiilhaponi mu Israeli mwonkhaye mu ikatema i Naeliya, irimu vaattukiye aya, ni ipulha khayarumpe iyaakha taaru ni nusu ni ikuruna nkayaawanelha ilhapo yonkhaye.
Ni Naeliya khayaarumiye wa anankhwelhi ariyoothe ahikhalhe anankhwelhi yaakhalha Userepta umwiinanoni ni ilhapo yo Usidoni.
Tho, yahaawo attu enchi yaawereiya makutulha mwiilhaponi mu Israeli Naelisha vaari aya anamilhohi, nansho khaawo ntu aalhamme ahikhalhe Nanaamani, ntu o Usiriya.”
Attu onkhaye yaari inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku veewilhe aya chiicho, nkayaarushiya.
Nkayeemelhacha, nkayankhweremiha uchereshere iwani ni unkusha mpaka vachereshere mwaako wiira ankakhelhe vathi wuuthi mwaako,
nansho nkaavira variyari aya ni urwaa.
Paahi Yesu nkaarwa Ukapenaumu, iwani yaari Ugalilaya, nkeettuchiha attu Nihuku no Wiittuwa.
Attu onkhaye yaari ashangaka chettuchiha awe, ukhalhawaya olhumacha wo ikuru.
Nkaakhalha ntu o mashoka o unanara wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku mmo, akhuwelha chinene,
“Niuttekenlheni hii, uwe Yesu o Nazareti? Uwilhe unoomolha? Kihochuwelha chinre awo, uwe phi karumiya ntakatifu a Nlhuku!”
Yesu nkoomolha nshoka no unanara nno, “Mmaalhe munkhume ulha ntu ulha!” Nshoka nkanammulhusha ntu ulhe vathi, nkanaathama wo hinrakalhiha.
Attu onkhaye nkayoomiya uwanoni olhumachaka ashineneru, “Ilha phi ishiyani vano? Wo machiri ni ikuru yolha ntu ulha nolhehera wiira mashoka o unanara, athamache, ni ayo anoothamacha!”
Mwaha wa Yesu nkawaawanelha kila vakittu velhaponi vawo.
Yesu nkaathama wi inupa yo unlhapelha Nlhuku nkaakelha unupani wa Nasimoni. Wowo ahokohi aya Nasimoni yaari areta iruttu, Yesu nkaahimeriya.
Nkaarwa vaathalhelhiye aya ni weemelha vachereshere ikori ni woomolha ureta waathame apwiyawe ayo. Ureta nkawaalhama, nkayaachokholha waaterekhelha.
Uchechilho, attu yaari ni manyampwana aya yaawereia nkayaawiihacha areta ayo wa Yesu, ni uyo nkeesheracha miono chawe kila mmoka nkayaalhamacha.
Mashoka o unanara ni ayo nkaayathamacha attu enchi, olhumachaka, “Uweva phi Mwaana a Nlhuku!”
Waashelhe waya Yesu ahothama vawani vawo, nkaarwa vakittu vaari awe yeekha. Attu khayaachokholha umwaavia, vaamwonne aya, nkayanchiichiha wiira hithame uwannyaya.
Nansho nkeerelhacha, “Kihophwanelhiya uhimiacha Malhove Orera o Imwene ya Nlhuku iwani chikina, ukhalhawaya Nlhuku kirumme wiira kipange yoyo ntheko uyo.”
Paahi etu nkaavira eettuchihachaka attu mu inupa cho unlhapelha Nlhuku ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea.
